Here’s a sneak peak of what’s been happening.
 

HI %FIRSTNAME%

We’ve been working behind the scenes on boarding Adobe Campaign into Allianz Ireland. We’ve included you on our first internal test email to share some of our journey and let you know what’s next! Plus lets be honest we’re also using you as a guinea pig to test out our new tool…

Why Adobe Campaign?

We’re currently using four distinct email solutions to send our customer emails, these have limited capabilities from a design perspective and also lack sufficient MIS, meaning we can’t see the level of customer engagement to measure their true impact, so we needed a change!

Want to find out more about Adobe Campaign, click below.
LEARN MORE

What’s next?

Quarter 2

Quote & Buy mails
